snippet: Patrick J. Foye, the executive director, who drew attention to a scheme to tie up traffic at the George Washington Bridge, said he had waited long enough to find out if he would effectively be replaced.
abstract: Patrick J Foye, executive director of Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, resigns, citing agency board's decision to extend already protracted search for its first chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Patrick J. Foye, the executive director, who drew attention to a scheme to tie up traffic at the George Washington Bridge, said he had waited long enough to find out if he would effectively be replaced.

headline.main: Port Authority Leader to Quit as C.E.O. Search Drags On
headline.print_headline: Port Agency Leader to Quit as C.E.O. Search Drags On

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
